column4: i have a laptop with no CD Rom drive, but i have a flash drive, is there any way to do a USB Flash Drive installation of Ubuntu?
I think it's possible. The manual also describes a network-based install. Is that an option?
well the concept IIRC is, you download the install iso and boot it from HD.
http://archive.ubuntulinux.org/ubuntu/dists/breezy/main/installer-i386/current/doc/manual/en/ Section 4.3 will answer your question, I think.
